data.name: About.HeaderText
data.value: Welcome to Forge of Games: Your Ultimate Heroes of History Companion

data.name: About.Text1
data.value: Whether you're planning your campaigns, optimizing hero stats, or uncovering the history behind your favorite characters, Forge of Games is your ultimate companion.

data.name: About.ListItem1
data.value: Access detailed campaign info for all regions, encounters and treasure hunt.

data.name: About.ListItem2
data.value: Dive into comprehensive hero stats and leveling resources.

data.name: About.ListItem3
data.value: Discover unique historical insights about each hero, sourced directly from their real-life legends.

data.name: About.Text2
data.value: More tools, including research calculators and city stats, are coming soon - stay tuned!

data.name: Common.Disclaimer.Text
data.value: Forge of Games is a fan-made website dedicated to the game Heroes of History. All rights to the game, its assets, and intellectual property are owned by their respective holders. Users are encouraged to consult the official Innogames website for the most up-to-date and accurate information. Forge of Games is not affiliated with or officially connected to the creators or publishers of Heroes of History. The content here is created to support the game’s community by providing unique tools, guides, and insights.

data.name: Tools.BuildingCost.Description
data.value: Calculate the resources needed to build or upgrade a building.

data.name: Tools.WonderCost.Description
data.value: Calculate the resources required to progress through world wonder levels.

data.name: Tools.HeroProgressionResourcesCalculator.Description
data.value: Calculate the resources needed to level up a hero.

data.name: HeroSelector.HelperText
data.value: Pick a hero. Start typing the name or select from the list.

data.name: Tools.HeroBuilder.Description
data.value: Configure your hero's potential by adjusting all four critical properties.

data.name: Tools.ResearchCalculator.Description
data.value: Calculate the resources required to open technologies.

data.name: Tools.ResearchCalculator.SelectOpenTech
data.value: Pick the last technologies you have discovered.

data.name: Tools.ResearchCalculator.SelectTargetTech
data.value: Pick technologies you want to discover.

data.value: Use City Planner to optimize your city

data.name: SupportUs.Why.Reason2
